name: Tathylia Chronicles
description:
(THIS IS A DEMO VERSION! MORE FEATURES AND CHAPTERS WILL BE ADDED LATER ON)

In the world of Tathylia, after a war that split the continent in pieces (both literally and figuratively), the embers of war are being stoked once again. Ragiel, an empire that has grown in power for a while after the war years ago, has decided to start taking over the entire continent of Tathylia. 

The heroes from all over the land must rise up and defend their homes from the prejudice and oppression of the Empire. And YOU must lead them.

This game is inspired by the Fire Emblem series. Specifically, the Radiant/Tellius Saga (FE9 and FE10). It's a story about overcoming prejudice and hate with kindness and compassion....and stabbing too I guess. 

This game is balanced to be slightly challenging, but still beatable for new and old SRPG players.  It's heavily story and character focused, as I believe that's the most important of any FE game...or story in general to be honest.

Enjoy fun features such as:

  • Talking and lots of it
  • Interesting maps with decent challenges and gimmicks
  • A large cast of fun characters.
  • Archers being useful
  • Nature magic!
  • Fantasy racism oh wait that's not a fun fea-
  • AND MORE!!!

Currently Playable: Act 1(The Silver Battalion) Chapters 1-7
